message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering our product! We're excited to discuss the details with you. We're willing to offer you the product for $900000. This is a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal, and we're confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. However, we're not willing to go as low as $750000. We're willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $850000. We believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway from my original offer. I'll offer $775000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
